channel.title: Help with editing ingame text!
channel.description:
I need help, is it possible to edit somewhere in a client so whenever you log in-game you will always talk in a certain color. I remember you could edit something in the client so you wouldn't talk in yellow, but instead talk in white, cyan, red, whatever you put in.
Is there a tutorial how to do this or does anyone know how to?
